ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 compression algorithm ideal for standalone DVR
Real-time live display for Full D1, Real-time live recording with each channel for D1:30FPS
Support all channel playback at the same time, and searching according to time or event
Support remote view with Mobile Phone(Windows CE\Symbian\Iphone\ Blackberry\ Android)
Multiple recording modes: manual recording, schedule recording, alarm recording, motion detection recording, time recording, and pre-recording.
ProductInfo.Name: 4CH Full D1 H.264 Home Video Security CCTV Surveillance DVR Record System Kit 4 x CMOS IR Day&Night Wandalproof Dome Camera
